Summary: I would highly recommend staying here. Very professional staff and very nice room. We found this place when were we’re dead tired and about ready to sleep in the car. It was very nice to see a friendly face at 3 in the morning.

Summary: This is a great hotel and very conveniently located. Rooms are big and clean, great bar downstairs in the lobby. There is also a restaurant. Parking is complimentary. Staff is very friendly. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Shellstar4,  Thank you so much for finding our hotel Great!  We really appreciate it and we hope to be part of your future trips! Thank you!

Summary: We stayed one night at the hotel.  when we checked in they gave us a room at the back end of the hotel.  Great walk but... the room had not been prepared so back we went to the reception.  They then gave us another room a floor up, again with the long walk.  This time it was ready.  Tried the internet but we hadn't been given proper instructions, just the password.  Had to call twice to get ourselves connected.  Room was ok, no breakfast included.  It's just a room, nothing special but the price was pretty good.  Not sure we would stay there again. Staff needs to be more alert.
Manager Response: Hello nonno2000,  We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with such detailed feedback about your stay.  We apologize to hear that several things throughout your stay did not meet your expectations.  Please note that your concerns has been shared to our staff for improvements.  We do hope you give us another chance to provide with a much better experience.

Summary: I stayed there for two nights. The staff was friendly but my room wasn't ready until almost 5pm when I checked in. The room was spacious and clean. The safe didn't work, but when I wanted to contact the front dest, I found out the phone didn't work. The bathroom was very clean with nice shower. I was little surprised that there was no toothbrush and toothpast. I had both with me, so there was no problem. My room was facing I-5 and I didn't realize the noise from I-5 until I turned the airconditioner off. The room wasn't equipped with central airconditioning system, but had one big unit under the window. The cooling was good, but it was rather loud at night when everything became so quiet. Ending up I needed to choose the noise from the airconditioner or from the cars and trucks
Manager Response: Hello Alan L,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel.    We apologize about the slight mishap and we're happy to inform you that it has been addressed.  We also would like to thank you for finding our hotel convenient.  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Ronnie Torres

Summary: The hotel was as expected.  It was nice and we enjoyed our stay.  For what we paid on Labor Day weekend it was well worth the price.  The pool was a little small but clean and since we were the only ones using it it was fine.  I would stay here again.   We were in a bargain room but the suites are really nice.  If I was staying with my hubby I would choose the suite.
Manager Response: Hello Hettern,  Thank you for the positive feedback about our hotel.  We are happy that we were able to exceed your expectations and we are looking forward to your next visit.  Thank you!  Sincerely,  Ronnie Torres

Summary: The rooms are really spacious and pretty clean.  The location not so great but good for an overnight stay. If you are planning on going to Laguna Beach like we were, you might want something closer but if you are looking for a good price and good rooms, this is a great option.
Manager Response: Hello Maribelmc111,  Thank you for the feedback.  We are happy to hear that you find our room spacious and very clean.  Yes, we are 10 - 15 minutes away from the beach.  We're looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations next time you are in town!  Sincerely,  Ronnie Torres General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, not your average 3 Star Hotel.
Summary: Amazing Hotel from the Lobby to the Room. Furnishings you would expect in a  Higher rated Hotel. Large Rooms, well maintained. Walk in Shower. A nice touch with a Complimentary Laundry(Byo Laundry Liquid) Staff friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Hello Glenn A,  Thank you so much for rating our hotel high.  Glad to hear that we exceeded your expectations!  We love to have you back soon!

Summary: Had the pleasure of staying here recently.  No complaints at all.  Nice spacious rooms.  Hotel had a modern feel to it's decor and was visually pleasing.  Staff seemed nice and professional.  Grounds look well maintained with a larger than it seems parking lot that goes back and has room for trailers or even a semi truck.  Didn't get a chance to check out the restaurant but it looked inviting.  Good value for a great location to explore the Gold Coast of southern Orange County.  Will stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Ron!  Thank you for your review and for choosing our hotel and for the awesome feedback!  We really appreciate it and we hope to have you back in the very near future.  Thanks Ron!

Summary: Just spent 3 days at the Laguna Hills Hotel (WOW) rooms were spotless, the Bar as a full bar, the restaurant was outstanding, the staff Sam and Angie were a 10, The rates were very good . Less then you would every expect to pay for this service.
Manager Response: Dear Tazman1953,  Wow!  Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback and for mentioning Sam and Angie!  This is such an awesome review and we love it!  Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My Mom was recovering from surgery and did not have air conditioning at home.  When a southern California heat wave hit we took her to the Hills Hotel.  They had availability in a comfortable cool room.  The staff also made a wheel chair available to us to use during our stay.  The service was great from the front desk associates to the house cleaning staff.  There is also a buffet brunch that is reasonably priced for hot food and an omelet bar.  The location is next to the 5 freeway but the room was quiet.  No freeway noise.   For the price and customer service I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Hello Chag1967,  Thank you so much for the excellent feedback!  We hope and trust that your mom is doing much better.  Thank you also for recommending us to everyone!  Hope to see you again soon and this time with your mom fully recovered from her surgery.

Summary: From the moment we checked in the vibes were amazing.  The staff was professional and helpful.  The hotel was clean and super retro chic.  Our room was clean, beds were very comfortable.  There was a wedding reception there and it was still quiet. Great stay!!
Manager Response: Hello Venitarandle,  Thank you so much for the perfect rating and for finding our hotel great!  We are so happy to hear that you had a great experience here at The Hills Hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you!

Summary: favorite hotel-always clean -comfortable beds-i stay here every trip to west coast-front desk are more like concierges-take great care of guests-manager Ronnie is always helpful always personable-nice restaurant in lobby-can't go wrong staying here. lounge area by pool very comfortable-pool and spa area very clean.
Manager Response: Hello Dan,  Wow!  Thank you so much for the fantastic review!  We are so happy that we are able to exceed your expectations!    We're looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations next time you are in town!  Thank you!

Summary: Staff exceeded expectations.  They understand service. Great rooms, spacious, very quiet and well maintained.  Fine restaurant.  Good location.  Didn't have time to do everything there but definitely will stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Jillybeans1969,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We appreciate the wonderful feedback and it's our pleasure having you as our valued guest.    We hope to see you again soon!  Thank you!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel on a trip for our anniversary in June 2017. It was clean, staff were great and the rooms were really cute. While at the hotel (even when outside near the pool area) you would not know you are so close the highway. It was quiet enough for us that we didn’t notice. The pool area was so nice and we spent a lot  time down there just relaxing on the comfortable furniture out there enjoying the mild June weather. We live in Florida so it was a really nice change of pace to enjoy the low humidity and it also was not 45,738 degrees outside. They have done a nice job decorating this hotel, we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Emerrick,  Thank you so much for staying with us!  So glad to hear the wonderful feedback and we are very pleased to hear that our staff made your stay pleasant!  Advanced Happy Anniversary to you and we hope to have you back again in the future.  Thank you!

Summary: Just needed a place to crash for Sabroso weekend. Stayed 2 nights, Friday & Saturday. In all honesty, I didn’t expect much. I was pleasantly surprised however. Will most definitely stay there again. Might even have to make an excuse this summer, to stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Eldest_Itch,  Beautiful feedback!  We appreciate you for giving us a perfect rating!  We love to have you back again this summer!  Thank you!

Summary: Check-in was easy, We showed up when it was slow. Got a luggage cart and helped ourselves with our luggage. Parking is near and ample.  I don't think they have valet or bell services. Room was Standard and clean. We went to the pool and it was kinda on the cold side, but nice for a motel. They do not have room service and the food options were closed for the Sunday we were there. I would stay here again if we needed a place to stay on a long drive, but definitely not a destination hotel.
Manager Response: Hello BAE_Tripping,  Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide us such a detailed feedback about your stay.     We apologize if our bellman was not available to assist you with your luggage and sorry to hear that our front desk did not offer assistance. I will personally make sure our staff will be more proactive.  Yes, our restaurant and lounge are closed on weekends but we do offer limited cold items available for purchase.  Thank you and we hope to have you back in the near future.  Take care.

Summary: We had a group of rooms for a wedding in Laguna Hills. All the rooms were very nice, comfortable and, with great staff. We stayed 2 nights at the Sapphire Suite ~ a fabulous place! Pool is nice and coffee shop with buffet breakfast, good and tasty. In other events, will be a repeat. View is to the freeway and mountains, It was quiet. Thank you.
Manager Response: Hello Kelly R,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We are so happy to hear that you and your entire group had a great time and experience here at The Hills Hotel.  We're looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations next time.  Thank you!

Summary: Check-in was extremely slow. The staff were all very friendly throughout the hotel.  The hotel has two elevators. Our room was large, clean, and nicely appointed. The bed was comfortable and had all non-feather pillows--great for allergy sufferers. There were power outlets on the lamps at each nightstand--excellent for charging phones and devices at bedside. The room had a mini fridge, coffeemaker, and microwave.  The bathroom had a shower/tub combo with no mold--great job, housekeeping! The shower water pressure was good and the hot water stayed hot. There was a multi-speed hairdryer under the sink.  The free (unsecured--boo!) WiFi worked well. Parking was free in the hotel's large, open-air lot.  I've stayed here before and would be happy to return, but secure that WiFi,
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us again.  We apologize for the extremely slow check in.  I would like to get more information about your check in process so we may have the chance to improve our overall services.    It's an honor to hear that you had a great overall experience and appreciate you for acknowledging our front desk and housekeeping staff.  We hope to welcome you back to the hotel soon!  Thank you!

Summary: The staff was very friendly and check in was a breeze. The Room was in excellent condition. The restaurant staff were friendly and the food was great. I enjoyed my breakfast. The location is great. Great job.

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay 3 times a charm
Summary: This is the 3rd time staying at this hotel, ALL 3 times are great to stay with friendly staff who greets you every time passing by, the hotel public area is always nice and neat, the guest rooms are clean and kept at top condition.  Great value, great stay.

We hope to see you again very soon, John!  Thank you!

Summary: Honestly, I kind of like the hotel. Its small and attempts a luxurious charm that I kind of appreciate. My wife on the other had complete disagreed... She didn't' like it from the moment we pulled up. She said it smells and the rooms are small... the hotel is not attractive at all from outside. It caused a big fight between us because she wanted to leave.   Anyway,,, I was ok with the place until a worker walked into our room without knocking. I was standing at the toilet, privates in hand about to go- she said sorry and walked out. I told the manager but they did nothing. This kind of irritated me. The beds are a bit hard too. Anyway... its an average place with an average price tag.
Manager Response: none

Summary: it's very close to highway and it's convenient if you drive, there is a mall (Laguna Hills Mall) to take a look. Room is clean and comfortable, only issue is you need to walk a bit far if your room is in back side of hotel.

Summary: Stayed here this weekend for my Niece's wedding. Very comfortable and upscale boutique feel. The ballroom was beautiful and large,  classy with a cocktail bar and lounge, and patio right beside it.  Staff was very nice and welcoming. Definitely would stay again!
Manager Response: Hello D C,  We are so happy to hear that you had a great time here at The Hills Hotel.  Thank you so much for the kind words about our ballroom and staff service.  We hope to see you again soon!

Rooms were Clean, Bed was comfortable and the shower had Hot water ... it's the little things.  Breakfast was good but significantly overpriced ... didn't eat dinner there.  Customer Service when needed was excellent.  Not sure of the room rate since I didn't foot the bill.

Summary Heading: Our first visit to Orange County and this lovely hotel.

Hotel is very nice, clean, so well decorated for Christmas, very clean, nice pool area and beautiful restaurant and lounge.  Staff, both room and especially front desk were so friendly and helpful with everything - outstanding!  Had a couple of minor issues with small things like the coffee maker and a new one was brought immediately and my husband had an issue with connecting to the internet and the front desk helped and shortly after a maintenance person came to help but we had solved the problem.  Was free laundry for guests too which was very helpful so we didn't have to mix dirty and clean clothes when packing for home.  Had a little problem with the heat.  It was quite cold when we were there and
Manager Response: Hello Wendy902,  So happy to hear that you had a great experience during your most recent visit and we appreciate you for highly recommending our hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.

No vending, no bottled water.  Wouldn't choose to stay there again because of staff and lack of amenities.
Manager Response: Hello GramsB487,  I am so sorry to hear that our staff ignored you and for the limited number of vending machines through out the hotel. I hope you will give us another chance to provide you with a much better service.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Much nicer than expected with amazing customer service

Summary Heading: I was not too impressed with the hotel
Summary: I was not impressed with the building, service or my total experience a a whole. The shower seemed to be missing a sliding glass door, so the water would accumulate on the floor each time a shower happens. The rear emergency doors were not locked, so you would be awaken all times of night with the loud slam of people leaving out of this door. Lots of events happening in the hotel, so much so that you could not go to the bar downstairs for a drink. Lastly, we had to ask the cleaning people to clean our room 3 times while we were there. There are also a lot of abandoned vehicles in the parking lot which takes away from an already less than appealing view. If you are in the room they dont even bother to knock and ask if you need fresh towels or linens. So needless to say, we
Manager Response: Hello Mike,  So sorry to hear about the dissatisfaction during your most recent stay with us.   I am glad to share with you that we have been updating the design of our bathroom by replacing the single glass shower door to two glass doors and we are very close to completion.  Unfortunately, we are unable to lock the emergency doors but we have replaced the door latch which helps minimize the noise.  I have also shared your experience with our housekeeping service to our housekeeping manager and we will make sure this will be addressed.   I hope you will give us another chance to provide you with a great service.  Please contact me directly via email at rtorres@thelagunahillshotel.com to discuss your experience directly.  Thank you!

Summary: Not great...not even good really.  The hotel sits on the side of the freeway.  I was given a room that had a window facing the very busy 5 freeway.  Needless to say, it wasn't a good night sleep because of the noise of the freeway.  If this was the last room in the hotel on a busy holiday weekend I could have understood why I got that room BUT it was on a Monday night at the beginning of December.  There is no central heat and air...the room temperature is controlled by a small unit under the window (which gives an indication of the age of this hotel).   You are either hot or you are cold as the thermostat is part of the unit and doesn't sense the temp in any other part of the room.  Oh, and the TV had a scratch that ran through the middle of the screen!
Manager Response: Hello L V,  Thank you for the feedback and apologize if you were not completely satisfied with your experience here at The Hills Hotel.  When it is convenient please contact me at rtorres@thelagunahillshotel.com so that we may have the opportunity to make up for this unsatisfactory part of your experience.  Thank you!

Summary: Everything is very Pretty, Wonderful & Lovely.   Especially we love to listen to whole  Building Music & Someone Playing Piano !  Traffic and Security are very convenient & safe near by No. 5 Freeway Exits. We do fly back from Houston, Texas to the Hill Hotel every year for Thanksgiving Family Gathering in Mission Viejo.  Yes, we had a very good time.  Thanks so much.  See you Next Year !  : )

Manager Response: Hello Donald G,  Thank you so much for staying with us each time your visit your kids.  We really appreciate everything you do for us.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Thank you!

Summary: Spent 5 nights at The Hills and for the most part had an enjoyable stay. The location is convenient to different places to eat and/or get coffee and breakfast in the mornings. The shower was a bit dated and I had an issue with the TV which, I felt, was taken care of very quickly and efficiently. Everyone from the staff was pleasant and friendly. The location was very convenient for where I had to go, which was in several different directions. I would absolutely recommend this hotel without reservation.

We apologize about that.  Despite the mishap,  we are so happy to hear that you had a great overall experience with us!  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: OK for a night for two.

Manager Response: Hello Coconut62,  Thank you for the feedback regarding ware on our hotel and appreciate you for giving us the opportunity to make improvements.  Please contact me directly via email at rtorres@thelagunahillshotel.com if there's anything I can assist you with in the near future.  Thank you!

Summary: The Hill Hotel is located slightly up on a hillside, but it doesn't offer any views. It does offer a nice stay. The hotel and rooms are furnished in modern kinda style. Pretty nice and clean. And unlike almost all the other hotels we've stayed at, the refrigerator and A/C unit is actually pretty quiet. There is a small cafe and a small lounge. Several small banquet rooms.The staff was excellent. Another good thing is it is located very close to the freeway. The bad thing is it is located very close to the freeway. The rooms on the freeway side are a little noisy. But all in all, this was a very nice stay.the hills hotel
Manager Response: Hello Rick C,  Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out such a fantastic review!  We're so happy to hear that you had a great overall experience!  We hope to see you again in the near future!  Thank you so much again for everything!

Summary: Second time I have stayed here located right off of Insterstate 5 in Laguna Hills. Beautiful lobby and reception area with an adjacent bar and cafe. Professionally trained staff, great rooms, pool/jacuzzi, and showers which get two thumbs up. Prices are resonably priced in the low $100’s and I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel and will stay here again.

Check in employees outstanding, warm greeting smiles when you walk by, Hotel well maintained, clean sparkling, and so inviting when entering for the first time and every time. Restaurant employees very attentive and had warm greetings each day we were there. We plan to be back very soon.
Manager Response: Hello Melba F,  Wow!  Thank you so much for the detailed information about your experience here at The Hills Hotel!  It is such an honor receiving a great feedback from you!  We are excited having you back!  Thank you!

Summary: Aside from the property being terrific, the staff is amazing.   I had a difficult situation which was made much easier thanks to their "yes" attitude towards service and accommodation.  There was no arguing, back and forth, or negotiating necessary when it came to honoring my request.  Top notch team all the way.  This is the only place I will stay when visiting the Laguna Beach area.  Many thanks!!
Manager Response: Hello Kmsmith1970,  We are very happy to hear that our entire staff were able to accommodate your  request and we thank you for appreciating it.  We also wish you all the best and we hope to see you again in the near future!  Thank you so much for being a wonderful guest.

Summary Heading: Don't let the pictures fool you
Summary: We were excited to stay at this hotel based on the images. I should have known better.   There was a gap between the carpet and the entry tile that exposed the tack strip. For those unfamiliar with a tack strip, it's a thin piece of wood with lots of nails the entire length of the carpet facing UPWARD and secures the carpet from sliding. All carpets have them.   So every time we passed to the door or to the washroom, we had to hop over the tack strip. Additionally, the first morning there we opened the window all the way. Behind the curtain was a huge cracking the window like those of a car windshield.  We informed the hotel staff about this and they informed us that they could upgrade us. We declined because it was late and we were traveling with a toddler who desperately
Manager Response: Hello Morganryan33,  Thank you so much for the detailed feedback.  We apologize for all the inconvenience you experienced during your stay.    I'm glad to inform you that the carpet has been repaired.  We checked the window and it has been confirmed that the actual window is not broken but the film has been damaged due to excessive heat gain and/or solar glare which looked like a broken window glass.  This has been addressed.    We apologize if we failed to inform you regarding the sprinkler head installation.  Our staff has been instructed to inform our guests regarding the installation and provide notice letter but again, apologize if we missed you.  Please contact me directly via email at rtorres@thelagunahillshotel.com if there's anything I can assist you with.  We hope you will give us another chance in the near future.  Thank you!

Summary: My stay at The Hills was great!  The staff was very personal and helpful and very accommodating.  We stayed for 4 nights and had a wonderful experience.  The location was so convenient to small shops, food, etc.
Manager Response: Hello Kathy R,  Our entire staff love and appreciate your feedback!  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Even though I was in the region for a business party at Universal City, I opted to use my choice points redemption and stay at the hills instead.  Great staff first of all.  Great convenient location not far from John Wayne Airport and I was able to fall asleep without any issue.  As far as the cheapest hotels, I have a difficult time falling asleep.  Furthermore, the TV was top notch!!!!  I wouldn't mind staying here again if necessary in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Van Ness K,  Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback and kind words regarding our hotel and entire staff!  We really appreciate it!  We love to have you back soon!

The design of the room was elegant and chic. The rest of the room was pretty standard. Having traveled a lot and been from Rodeways to Sheratons, this was worth more than what I paid for. Choice is a great brand of hotels for the middle income individual or family. This is a nice boutique hotel in a very expensive area. As a a hotel GM myself, I realize that customers forget to realize that they did pick their hotel for value - whether it's financial, amenities, etc. This an exceptionally well-run hotel. Cleanliness was above the industry standard. Thank you and my girlfriend enjoyed it. That's really all that

We're glad you and your girlfriend enjoyed your stay!  Thank you Paul!

Manager Response: Hello Americo P,  Thank you so much for the great feedback!  Our entire staff really appreciate the kinds words.  We are looking forward to have you back here at The Hills Hotel.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Modern design pervades very pleasant hotel

Manager Response: Hello Bill A,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate you for recommending us to everyone!  We hope to see you again very soon!  Thank you!

Summary: Only needed to stay for one night and this boutique brand hotel looked promising but ended up quite disappointing.   First impressions at the front desk already established the type of service to be expected. The woman initially started to read my address from my license out loud to confirm if that was my place of residence (not unnecessary). Upon asking for my email address which I did not want to or need to provide but was told it was mandatory, I unfortunately then responded with slight frustration when she asked me to repeat myself (not very nicely) more than three times spelling out a 7-letter word. This may be tied to my next complaints about the room she then booked me to.   Room: Upon entering, the mini fridge door was left wide open as well as a drawer which instigated
Manager Response: Hello Jestraveling,  Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We are disappointed to hear all the mishap you experienced during your stay.  Our frontdesk supervisors has been advised regarding your check in process.  It is not part of our check in process to read out loud to confirm your address and mandating for guest to provide email address.  I will make sure this will be addressed right away.  I am sorry if you find it odd seeing our fridge open upon check in. We will definitely find an alternate solution to avoid this type of situation.  As for the drawer in the room, it was simply our error.  The drawer was not level and some of the latches were not working properly.  This also happened to some of the rooms but our Chief Engineer has resolved this matter.  We are in a process of replacing all shower pans that has sub par condition.  We are 60% completion and will make sure to complete this project in a timely manner.  Again, we apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. However, we hope you will still give us another chance to provide you with a much better and improved overall service and experience. I hope the rest of your trip to Laguna Hills was just as enjoyable! We'll see you next time.   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My husband and I spent two nights at the Hills Hotel for a wedding.   The bride and groom had a block of rooms for guests and held their reception in the ballroom.   Check in was fine, front desk staff helpful, nicely appointed lobby, good sized fridge in the room.   All the typical nice hotel stuff. Then, an emergency.   Minutes before the black tie reception, my husband was zipping up my cocktail dress, when the whole zipper housing popped off in his hand!   Disaster!   He rushed down to the front desk in search of maybe a needle and thread, and came back with my hero - Eva Kenny - Catering Coordinator by day, emergency seamstress by night.   She literally threaded a bunch of needles and sewed me in to my dress!   Within ten minutes, I was perfectly dressed, with no one being
Manager Response: What a lovely story, Sarah! I can only imagine how stressful that must have been when your zipper broke. There's nothing more important to us than making sure you're taken care of -- I'm thrilled to hear that Eva went above and beyond to make sure you made it the reception! I'll be sure to let her know you left her such an amazing review.   It sounds like you and your husband had a great night! The next time you're around Laguna Hills, we'd be happy to have you in.   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Nicely furnished quiet room freeway close
Summary: We were staying only one night to attend a radio station celebration near the hotel. We had to be at the celebration by 3pm, which is hotel check-in time. I had asked if we could check in at 2pm. The employee at the desk went out of his way to find a room that was finished by housekeeping early, even walking to the room to check personally. As we walked past the desk on the way to the event, the young man asked if everything was satisfactory.  The room was nicely upgraded and spotless. There is plenty of free parking near the hotel.  The hotel was busy but quiet all night. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi, Michael! What a great review -- thank you for taking the time to share your visit with us! It sounds like you had some fun and exciting plans during your time in Laguna Hills. It was our pleasure to get you checked in sooner so you could get to your celebration! We hope to see you the next time you're in the area.   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: The Hills is a wonderful gem
Summary: I was a little hesitant about booking this hotel, but I am so happy that I did. The staff is extremely helpful and kind. They pay attention to detail and the service is great. My husband and I stayed here while attending a concert. The beds although small were extremely comfortable and the room was clean and quiet. It was a little chilly so we did not get a chance to test pool, but area looked really nice. The breakfast buffet was good and the price was reasonable. I will definitely stay at this hotel if I am ever in the area again.
Manager Response: I'm thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, Rochelle. It sounds like our team took great care of you, which is wonderful. I hope you and your husband had a blast visiting Laguna Hills and seeing the concert.  Until next time,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Economical hotel if you're traveling up and down the OC
Summary: The hotel is a short drive from the Santa Ana airport (and I think they have a shuttle as well but I didn't use it as I needed a rental car). It doesn't look like much when you drive in -- looks quite dated from the outside but had ample parking and upon check-in, I was pleasantly surprised with the room. I got a room on the first floor (facing the parking lot, which I'm OK with as I was not here for the views). The room appeared to have been recently remodeled - modern bathroom with all the amenities you'd need, spacious and clean bed and linens, closet with robes and slippers, a refrigerator and safe, iron and ironing board. I used the hotel as my base for events across Orange County that I was attending. Tried the breakfast at the hotel cafe which was just average -- I'd skip
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. It's great to hear that we're your go-to spot when you're traveling to Orange County from the Bay Area. Next time, don't hesitate to ask for a great view -- it makes your stay that much more homey! We hope to see you back in soon.   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Hills Hotel
Summary: From the time that I reserved the room over the phone, until my departure, it was a wonderful experience.  I evacuated the San Diego fires and decided to go far enough away to escape the smoke.  Every employee at the Hills Hotel made me feel very special.  I could not have asked for a better experience.  I would recommend the Hills a single person or a family.  Great place.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you in to our hotel, Fran. I'm so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. The next time you're around Laguna Hills (I hope for much happier circumstances), we'd love to see you again.   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: This used to be a nice hotel that we would stay at every year but, sadly, it has declined over the past few years.  Even though our key packets were ready at check-in--sitting there waiting for us--the staff was very slow to check us in.  The lobby smelled musty, and the elevators and hallways reeked of perfumey cleaning solution, as if they were trying to mask other odors.  The rooms are large enough. Our room smelled strongly of mold. It was so overpowering that we got instant sinus problems and headache. Our colleague sat at the pool for fresh air and to clear his sinuses, only to return to his room to have it worsen.  We heard a dribbling sound from the bathroom. On inspection, there was a panel on the ceiling above the shower head that, out of nowhere, just started leaking.
Manager Response: I'm disappointed to hear that you and your colleague didn't enjoy your visit more. I can assure you that our maintenance team is updating and renovating diligently, and any leaks or issues you may find we'd want to take care of right away. Also, we've never heard complaints of mold before, so this is a bit concerning. Do you have any other allergies? Either way, I'll certainly look further into this.   I hope that you all had a fun and relaxing time around Laguna Hills. The next time you make the trip from San Francisco, we'd be happy to welcome you back in. I know that with our excellent guest care, we could really knock it out of the park for you.   All the best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Best Hotel I have ever been in. Costumer Service is great and everyone is very friendly and professional. My room was extremely quiet and with two awesome beds. I slept very good. The restaurant is good and service is friendly there too.. just great!!!
Manager Response: What a lovely review, Annie -- thank you for sharing your experience with us! It sounds like you had a great time in Laguna Hills, which is wonderful. The next time you visit the area, we'd love to have you stay with us.   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Nightmere started as soon as I walked into the room. The safe wasnt bolted down. No batteries in the remotes. Although the room was "new" you can tell the put new stickers over old Holiday Inn signs. Room had no tissue.  A/C didnt work. Fridge was off and empty.  Pool was sad and lonely.  Worst of all at 11PM there was a woman screaming from room 208. I called the desk and they asked me what to do!?!?! Agent said, "Should I call 911 or what?"  She ended up sending a houseman.  Failed!  This place needs a manager who knows how to run a hotel, not a MOTEL!
Manager Response: I'm shocked that you were so disappointed in your stay. First and foremost, guest safety is a top priority, which is why our team asked if they should call for additional help. To clarify, we would never ask you how to handle the situation. Our team is highly trained on how to proceed with noise violations, and I'm glad that this was taken care of right away.   As for the other aspects of your stay, I wish we would have had the chance to take care of these issues right away. Above all, we want you to feel comfortable, so we would have sent someone to take care of your AC and TV remote right away. The last thing we want is our guests to leave unsatisfied, so I sincerely apologize we missed the opportunity to improve your experience before you left.  Thank you,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Everything was fine, but nothing exceptional. Staff was welcoming. Beds were comfortable. Decor was old - could use some upgrading, particularly in bathroom. Overall style is glitzy. I can't recommend the in-hotel restaurant.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear that you didn't have an exceptional stay with us. While some hotels may be fine with average, we strive for perfection. That's why we're always upgrading and improving our rooms.  I hope you enjoyed the rest of your time in Laguna Hills. The next time you visit the area, we hope to welcome you back in!   Take care,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: This was my second year staying at The Hills Hotel. A colleague recommended it because it's near our office, and I was coming in for a day for meetings. As I made my reservation this second year I had a vague memory of not being impressed with the hotel the year before, but my colleague's recommendation led me to try it again.  Once again, I was less-than-impressed. Though the staff are helpful, the bed was comfortable, and the TV in the room was great, the overall feel of the hotel isn't pleasant. It's dark and dreary in nearly every area of the building. The attempt at glitz and glamour in the decor feels kind of cheap and false, calling to my mind The Beverly Hillbillies. The electronic photos that line the hallway on the first floor don't all work properly, so the flashing
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear that you weren't more impressed on your second stay with us, Debbie.I know I already spoke with you over the weekend regarding this  but I wanted to respond again here on TripAdvisor.  I'm glad to hear that our team took excellent care of you. The next time you visit your office near Laguna Hills, we'd be happy to welcome you back in.   Take care,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: The overall impression of the property is very elegant!  It hits you from the moment you drive up to the door.   The lighting throughout the commons areas is a throwback to the Golden Age ... but that's where it ends.  The lounge and dining rooms were uncomfortably dark, which detracted from an otherwise great experience.  I expected the menu to be overpriced, but not to the extent it was, especially considering the portion sizes.  However, they have a VERY talented chef staff, and the carrot ginger soup was to die for!  Their pastry chef should be required to register as a deadly weapon! (that's a good thing, but not if one is trying to lose weight :)  ).  I was there as part of a 3 day business class, and the service from the banquet waiter assigned to us was beyond
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing those details about your visit, Mackey. While I'm thrilled to hear that our team took excellent care of you throughout your stay, I'm sorry that the same couldn't be said about our furniture. You're right -- there must have been a miscommunication about the chair in your room, because those details are normally not missed. I appreciate you letting me know.   I hope you had a nice time visiting the Laguna Hills area. The next time you come by California from the Midwest, we'd love to welcome you back in to our hotel.   All the best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: It's All About Style And Experimentation
Summary: If you want perfection of the sort that one sometimes sees in four-star hotels, you won't find exactly that here. The Ascend Collection is all about really trying to say something interesting with a property, and Laguna Hills' "The Hills" is no exception. At every turn, the designers thought of something interesting to do. What I really liked is their constant play with lighting and reflection and mirrors. It's all good, clean fun! A refreshing change of pace. The room are pretty clean, but not immaculately so. There are flaws here and there, small broken things here and there, and details not seen to. But, on the other hand, the front desk people have a great attitude and are fun. The lobby is grand and exciting. The lighting in the bar is wild too. The sound insulation is not
Manager Response: Hello Mel, Thank you for sharing those details on here. Your feeback is greatly appreciated! The next time you visit the Laguna area, we'd love to have you back in to stay.   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I selected this hotel because I wanted to use my Choice hotel points and because it was very convenient to meetings.   I am usually afraid of budget Choice properties and dislike most Choice hotel low-end brands.  This was a pleasant surprise!    The room on my first night, 407, faced the freeway but I got there very late and the freeway noise was not bad at all... the dual layers of glass seemed to do their job.... I had no problem sleeping and the bed was great!  There was,,  however, no fresh air, just 2 layers of tightly sealed glass.   By day the views from this room were nice beyond the freeway towards the mountains, but after a day of training, the constant hum of the freeway was annoying when I wanted peace and quiet to work and think.  I was moved to an upgraded to an
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fantastic place to stay. I will be back.
Summary: upscale room for a modest   price. Excellent service and we arrived very late. Weather was rainy so we'll use the     pool next time.  Nice to be close to many places of service and close to beach. We visited for fun, not business, but looked like there were nice meeting rooms, etc .
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us! I'm thrilled to hear that you enjoyed an upscale room for a modest price. That's exactly what we try to offer our guests. I hope you had a wonderful trip to Laguna Hills, and I look forward to your next visit.  Best wishes, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My mother was recently hospitalized at Mission Hospital in Mission Viejo for a few days.  I flew down from the Sacramento area to be close to her.  Although I had noticed The Hills Hotel from the freeway in the past, I had never stayed there...so I gave it a try.  I was extremely pleased.  My room was spotless, quiet, and had very comfortable bedding.  Kudos to the front desk staff--they were very courteous and helpful.  Once I told them the reason for my visit, the on-duty staff never failed to ask me how my mother was doing.  I put in some long hours sitting in the hospital by my mother's bedside, and it was always a delight to come "home" to the hotel.  This location is perfect of you are visiting South Orange County.  Mission Viejo, Dana Point and San Clemente are all close
Manager Response: I'm so glad you had such a comfortable stay with us, especially since you were visiting Mission Viejo under difficult circumstances. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their courteous and helpful service. Our thoughts are with your mother and we wish you both all the best.  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly front desk staff, but not an hotel for business travel
Summary: Hotel booked for me by my company - I usually stay in Marriott brand hotels, but apparently this remodeled hotel is one of better ones in Irvine area (???).  Off to a good start - friendly greeting, chick to change room away from freeway side of building. First impressions of remodeled room were good - comfy bed, good shower for freshening up after flight from London.  But the downsides - extremely poor and unreliable wireless network thoughout the hotel, on 2 mornings I was unable to connect on laptop, phone or ipad. Only one phone in room - by bed, and not on desk. Poor soundproofing from room above (not helped by the guest occupying that room walking about in what sounded like high heels on the tiled area of floor at 3am in the morning for at least 20 minutes.  I'll be
Manager Response: While I'm glad you experienced friendly service and appreciated our recent renovations, I'm sorry you thought it was difficult to conduct business in your room. I completely understand how frustrating it is when your wireless doesn't connect. Do you mind letting me know what room you stayed in? I want to make sure our wireless is functioning properly going forward.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My review would have been 1 star if it wasn't for management fixing the situation.  The construction was so loud my ears burst at 8 AM.  Never coming back here again...  Wouldn't have anyway, as it was just for a 2 night quick stay as my estate was having some construction done to it.  Therefore, I paid to escape construction but ended up in the middle of construction.  Good game, thanks front desk for warning me...
Manager Response: Patrick,  I sincerely apologize for the construction noise. We try our best to renovate and modernize our hotel while still making sure our guests enjoy a comfortable stay. It was nice talking to you earlier this week and for accepting our apologies.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: We picked this hotel for the location, as we were visiting friends in the area,  We were just looking for "clean and safe".  Turned out the staff was very friendly, the service was truly excellent, and the young waiter in the restaurant was eager to be helpful.  We had a very nice experience at the Hills Hotel, and hope to go back again.  We will also recommend it to friends.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you were pleasantly surprised! I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their helpful and enthusiastic service. As a small independent hotel, I really appreciate you recommending us to friends. Hope to see you back again, too!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Love the fact that this location took dogs so we booked it.  The clerk who checked us in was a delight.  The room was OK but it smelled smokey and we don't smoke.  The shower was so old we needed help getting it to work (and we travel all the time!!!).  Even though the property felt safe, the doors and windows to the room did not feel very secure.  They take dogs but there is little grass to walk them and no poopy bags or stations or water bowls out.  Breakfast is complementary, and it was very good, but best of all was the man working the area in the back.  Friendly & amazing service.  If they work on a few things they will get repeat business.
Manager Response: Hi Janis,  While I'm delighted to hear that you experienced friendly and helpful service, I'm sorry you felt a few aspects of your room was unsecured. We're working hard to renovate every single room so that future guests enjoy a much more pleasant experience. If you have any suggestions for us as we go forward with renovations, please let me know.   Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Two nights spent in a very comfortable room with friendly and excellent service. Very convenient location just off I5 close to local amenities. Room was comfortable and Bar & restaurant were  very nice too. Thanks for the enjoyable stay I will be back.
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear you had such a pleasant and comfortable stay! Your experience is what we want for all our guests. It was a pleasure hosting you, and I look forward to your next stay.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Loved the renovations of the hotel.  The only disappointment was the bathroom area.  No place to hang towels and shower (although I realize it's the new modern way) had no door to completely close while showering.  The beds were extremely comfortable and the rooms were decorated nicely.  VERY CLEAN and staff was super nice. The bartender, Monica, in the bar was extremely friendly and nice.  Would recommend.  Priced right....
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us! I'm glad to know you appreciate all the work we've done to renovate our hotel. It's our goal to create a comfortable and inviting space for our guests, so I'm thrilled that's exactly what you experienced. I'll be sure to pass along your kind note to Monica as well. Looking forward to your next stay with us!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: First time back to CA since moving, picked a great place to stay.
Summary: I had not been in the hotel in over 22 years and never since they changed ownership.  The people working there were very friendly, the rooms were great, loved the bed and loved the pillows even more. Actually wanted to take one, but, I am not a thief.  The restaurant was really good and the breakfast was perfect.    Next time I go back home, this is where I am staying, if the rates don't go up.
Manager Response: Hi Tom,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. Considering your last stay with us was over 22 years ago, I'm delighted to hear that you still experienced friendly service and enjoyed a comfortable stay. Now that you're back in California, I hope you get another chance to stay with us again soon!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: After seeing the good reviews on this hotel, we decided to book a room here on a recent trip to Orange County.  It is an old hotel that is being remodeled (badly in need of it), and I can confirm the complaint about the hard and lumpy mattresses.  When we got up we discovered a bed bug crawling on our clothes that were draped over a chair from the night before.  We captured the bed bug and took it to our county agricultural department for a positive identification, and they confirmed that it was a bed bug.  We contacted the hotel management to let them know that they needed to fumigate the room / hotel, but they accused us of bringing in the bed bug.  County Public Health informed us that they had received other complaints regarding bed bugs at the Hills Hotel.
Manager Response: I'm shocked and alarmed to learn that you found a bed bug in your room. We take the health and safety of our guests very seriously, so I want to investigate the matter right away. I apologize to hear that you didn't enjoy our brand new mattress.    Hope to hear back from you soon, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here over Valentine's Day Weekend. The hotel is conveniently located near the freeway. Parking was easy and there was plenty of space in the lots. The front staff greeted us warmly and got us checked in quickly. The lobby was beautifully designed and the lobby bathrooms were lovely.  We had a newly renovated room which was nice and modern. I was really impressed with the design of the room and thought it was well executed. The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable. It was probably the most comfortable hotel bed I've ever slept in. The bathroom was clean for the most part (a few stains on the door) and featured the same cool modern design of the room and was very well lit. The shower, on the other hand, was odd. It was a modern walk-in showers with no
Manager Response: Hi Carmen,  Thanks for choosing to stay with us during Valentine's Day Weekend. I'm honored to know you thought your bed was the most comfortable hotel bed you've ever slept in. I'm also glad to know you experienced friendly and helpful service from the moment you checked in. I sincerely apologize, though, for the noise you experienced. I completely understand how uncomfortable that can be. We weren't doing any construction that weekend, so I'm surprised you heard drilling. As you know, Valentine's weekend is particularly busy for us. I assure you our rooms are normally much more quiet. If you have any suggestions on how we can decrease the noise heard from rooms, please let me know.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Convienent location to freeway, but not a freeway feel.
Summary: Very nice facility. Newly remodeled rooms, great beds and pillows. Excellent, accommodating  staff. On site restaurant and bar nice with a good menu and food.  Bartender is great. She remembers everyone and their likes!  Front staff very customer service trained.  Small ice buckets and ice and vending machines not on every floor. Maybe after remodel completed. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'm delighted to hear that from our bar to our front desk, you experienced personable and helpful service. It's also nice to know you appreciate all the work we've done to remodel our entire interior. Looking forward to your next stay with us!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Good food, peaceful sleep, wonderful staff
Summary: Stayed here for a couple of nights while attending a wedding held at the same venue. The staff are friendly and professional. Merci beaucoup Stéphane pour un accueil chaleureux.   Breakfast is good, there's a variety of pastries/scones. However, I would have preferred simple plain sliced bread or croissants as what was on offer was too sweet for me.   The food served at the wedding was fantastic.   I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for recommending us! I'm so glad to hear you had such a relaxing and peaceful stay. I'll be sure to let the entire team know you appreciated their friendly and professional service. Hope you get a chance to visit Laguna Hills again soon!  Best wishes, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: It was calm and pleasant. We arrived on a Friday evening we had the opportunity to listen to jazz music while we sat on the 2nd floor where they have couches to sit and have drinks. I thought they where going to say something to us and they didnt.
Manager Response: Thanks Elsa! I'm glad you had a calm and pleasant experience. Next time you're in the mood for cocktails and jazz, be sure to visit!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: A little more upscale than other Choice hotels brands.  You can tell they have been completing upgrades since acquiring the property.  Staff was friendly and attended to our needs and didn't just show a map to our room but actually came out from behind the desk and directed us where to park and where the door was to the hallway for our room.   Rooms were nice and clean and the restaurant was clean and friendly and the food was good.  Service was a little slow in the restaurant but that could be because there were alot of room service requests and we were not in a hurry.    Only complaint was that since there were only double beds and not a queen size bed (at least) for rooms that slept 4 people. The beds were comfy but there was plenty of room for the queens in the room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for recommending us! We've put in a lot of work renovating our entire interior, so it's nice to know you recognize and appreciate it. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their friendly and helpful service as well. Looking forward to your next stay with us!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Very happy with The Hills Hotel. Our room was spotless. Front desk staff and every employee we encountered couldn't have been nicer.  We had a recently renovated room that was perfect. Would definitely recommend The Hills Hotel and we will be staying there on future visits to Laguna Hills.
Manager Response: Thanks for the five-star recommendation! We work hard to ensure your entire visit is enjoyable, so I look forward to passing along your compliments to the team — flattering to know all our hard work had paid off. Until next time, take care!  Best wishes,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Unfortunately this wasn't a business or pleasure trip, but our stay at the Hills was wonderful.  It made the trip a lot easier to handle.   All your staff were pleasant and your cleaning staff was excellent.  If I had one complaint it was the lack of drainage in the bath tub when we took our showers.  No we didn't complaint because after we got ready the only thing on our minds was getting back to our family member with cancer and his family.   The only other small thing was the clock/radio.  Some of the digits were missing so telling time was funny.  Which we both needed.
Manager Response: I hope you and your family are doing well since you visited. Even though you were in Laguna Hills under less than ideal circumstances, I'm really glad we were able to make your visit a wonderful experience. I appreciate your feedback about our showers, and will make sure the drainage issue is corrected. I wish you and your family all the best.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Stayed here in Feb 2014 with family of 5. The newly renovated rooms were beautiful. The guys at the front desk were very friendly and attentive at check in. We also decided to eat at the hotel instead of search for a restaurant. Glad we did! The food and service was also excellent. Book with confidence...
Manager Response: Thanks Matt! I'm thrilled to hear you and your family had such a fantastic stay. It's nice to know you appreciate our new renovations, and I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciate their friendly and attentive service. Looking forward to your next stay with us!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: his use to be a Holiday Inn.  The outside may look dated but the rooms have been updated.  The rooms are clean.  The bathrooms are modern.  It has a modern look with nice lighting.  The staff is friendly.  The rooms are large.  The staff is friendly.  Good rates can be found on line.  I did not try the restaurant.  The Restaurant has limited hours.
Manager Response: Hi Frankie,  I know we already wrote to each other on Yelp, but I wanted to thank you for recommending us on TripAdvisor as well. As a small independent hotel, your support really means a lot. Hope you get a chance to stay with us again soon!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: As modestly priced traveller hotels go, this place is top-notch. Very well built (read: sound proof), excellent staff (and lots of them), helpful front desk. Had breakfast at the restaurant once, and it was good but (not surprisingly) expensive. There are other places to eat within 1 mile.   I've stayed here several times and never been disappointed.
Manager Response: Thanks Mickey! I'm thrilled to hear that you've never been disappointed during all your stays with us. That's the goal! I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their excellent service. Hope you get a chance to visit Laguna Hills again soon!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Front desk service was very friendly and customer service oriented.  I felt very comfortable immediately upon arrival and knew it would be a pleasant stay.  Sure enough, it was.  The room was nice, clean, and roomy, and the bed was very comfortable.  This was a business trip for me and I had a choice between this hotel and a couple of hotels closer to the coast.  This was my choice due to abundance of free parking and free internet as well.  Plus, I was literally only minutes from the coast for a quick sightseeing trip.  I'm very happy with my choice to stay here and would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thanks Greg! I'm happy to hear that from our friendly service to your clean and spacious room, your overall stay was comfortable and enjoyable. That's the goal! I hope you had a productive (and fun) business trip, and I look forward to your next visit.  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: 4th floor ugliness.  Wacko interior design.  Horrible bathroom fixtures.  Wierd ramp from lobby to elevator, practically ran myself over with the luggage cart.  IF you do stay here, request a room on a remodeled floor.
Manager Response: Ed and Kathy,  I'm sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your stay with us. As you mentioned, we are currently remodeling our entire interior and updating each room with new fixtures. We're confident these changes will have a positive impact on our future guests' experience. If you have any constructive suggestions for us to improve, please let me know.  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Warm welcoming staff but not much of a location
Summary: I stayed at this hotel due to a business trip to neighboring area Nice and cozy but not really welcoming staff. It's right off the freeway, but that's the view from your room as well.  Pool and gym are OK... Relatively close to any where in the area
Manager Response: Hi Ahmad,  Thanks for choosing to stay with us. While I'm glad you found your room nice and cozy, I'm alarmed to hear you thought our staff wasn't very welcoming. Do you mind letting me know what you experienced in more detail? As for our amenities, it's our goal to offer our guests a clean and comfortable place to stay that's conveniently located in town. If you have any suggestions on how we can better serve our guests.  Please contact me by phone at 949 586 5000 or by email at rtorres@thelagunahillshotel.com.  Thank you!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff that cares about your stay
Summary: My wife and daughter and I stayed for about a week at the Hills Hotel and had a very pleasant stay. The price was very fair for the accommodations. We would stay there again and would recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our staff is very dedicated to customer service and goes above and beyond to make sure our guests enjoy a wonderful stay. I'll be sure to let the team know you appreciate their great work. Looking forward to your next stay with us!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Location ok because it's right off the freeway, but that's the view from your room as well. Rooms were decent; updated. Our bathroom had some dirt/hair on the floor. Eww. The 'Fitness Center' was a complete let down. Just a standard hotel room with 4 cardio machines, 2 of which didn't work. When we told the front desk, they gave us a blank stare and it was obvious they didn't care. Our room took about 15 minutes to produce WARM water, but we didn't report it until checkout, so it possibly could have been fixed. Bartender was personable. We stayed here to attend a wedding on the property, which was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. While I'm glad you had a fun time at the wedding, I'm sorry you were disappointed with your hotel room. Had we known that you discovered some dirt on your bathroom floor, our housekeeping staff would've cleaned it for you right away. As for our gym, we are currently in the process of renovating it and adding more machines. If you have any other suggestions for us to improve, please let me know.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Affordable with great beds and linens
Summary: Currently undergoing renovations, this is going to be a fabulous spot!  Lobby looks amazing!  Staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  Great spot - easy to get to and close to many shops and restaurants.  Nice pool and deck.  Our rooms had not been renovated yet, but the furniture, beds and linens were very nice.  Excited to see how the rooms look when they renovate.  Restaurant was great - well priced and fabulous food.  Again, great staff!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recommending us. It's nice to know you appreciate all the hard work we've put into our renovations, and we hope future guests have an even better experience with us once they're completed. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their friendly and helpful service as well. Looking forward to your next stay with us!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I normally stay at the Hills Hotel every weekend while visiting my son. Due to the holidays my recent stay for 16 days! I have to say it was like being home for 16 days because of the fantastic staff at the Hotel. They made our extended stay comfortable and were there for us with whatever we needed whenever we needed it!  Great Hotel, would highly recommend to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us whenever you visit your son. Knowing that you felt as if you were home is the best compliment. We want all of our guests to feel that way. Looking forward to your next stay with us!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Very affordable & almost comes across as a 4-star hotel
Summary: 1. The hotel has a nice touch of a 4-star hotel (although it's a 3-star hotel).  2. The lobby is very nice, the staff is very friendly and helpful and always available.  3. A very big plus is the free self-service washer and dryer whereas the Wi-Fi is awfully slow and literally unusable at certain times (evening & early morning).  4. The room we had was also quite big as well as clean with lots of space, a bathrobe, an iron and ironing-board, a safe and a fridge.  5. Another minus is the beds. While they are very comfortable they do feel a bit fragile, almost like self-built at their lower part. My wife claims her pillow or bedsheets smelled a bit like cigarette smoke once or twice, but I personally can't say that about mine. I think that smell came from outside as the pool area
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'm happy to hear that, on the whole, you had a pleasant and comfortable stay. I'll be sure to let the staff know you found our service friendly and helpful. They work hard to make sure all our guests have a fantastic experience. I appreciate your feedback about our WiFi, we recently upgrade our service to fiber optics. I will look into the matter to make sure it works more properly going forward. I hope you keep us in mind the next time you're visiting Laguna Hills!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: This newly renovated Holiday Inn was beautiful and clean.  Staff was very friendly and the rooms were spacious and clean and pet-friendly!  The King-sized bed was quite comfortable and pleasant for the duration.
Manager Response: Thank you Ben! I'm delighted to hear you enjoyed a comfortable stay, and I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their friendly service. The next time you're visiting Laguna Hills, we hope you stay with us again!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Dishonesty is never good for business
Summary: Agents were quick and efficient upon check-in but their service lacked warmth.  When we got to our room my husband and I realized we'd booked a room with 2 double beds and so we called down and asked for a king.  Aware that the upgrade would cost extra (we saw the price difference online) we went back downstairs to get our new keys.  The agent quoted us the new price for the upgrade and to our surprise she doubled it.  We were both too tired to care and went into our new room.  Aside from stains on the furniture and some minor maintenance issues the room was clean.  Needless to say, we will be finding accomodations elsewhere in the future.
Manager Response: I apologize about the confusion.  We have several different types of king beds and each type has different rates.  I want to make this right.  Please contact me at 949 586 5000 ext. 142.  I'm looking forward to hear back from you.  Thank you!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Hills Hotel, Laguna Beach is very unsatisfactory
Summary: Laguna Hills Hotel was,terrible, having stayed there two years ago I was grossly disappointed.  The "newly renovated" and over-charged bathroom was a joke - not one towel rack, a plate glass i/2 wall for the shower - an accident waiting to happen.  At 3 AM the framing from the bathroom door crashed on to my bed, thank God I was in the bathroom.  Housekeeping was poor, the agreeable staff mostly does not speak English and they do not":get it"  Manager Armank offered  me some compensation which was clearly unsatisfactory.but it... is not my style to get into a verbal confrontation.  I told him I will not be staying in his hotel for a third year.
Manager Response: Eleanor,  I'm so sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your stay with us. In particular, I sincerely apologize for the door framing that fell on your bed. I completely agree that that is unacceptable, and I will make sure our maintenance staff looks into that issue right away so that that doesn't happen to future guests.  Please contact me directly at 949 586 5000 ext. 142.  Thank you!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: We stayed for one night at The Hills to see how it compared with a hotel in Laguna Woods where we usually stay when visiting Laguna Hills.   Plus We had room 404 on the top floor. No neighbor noise. Reasonably large room Friendly check-in and check-out and greeting whenever we passed the reception desk. Availability of two elevators to serve only 4 levels We were asked how was our stay, and the reception staff jotted down our suggestions for improvement (though we only mentioned a few)  Reasonably good location, lots of parking Beautiful lobby and mezzanine, clearly a favorite place for meetings and seminars They.graciously allowed us to check out at 1 pm Free wi-fi  Minus Noise of traffic was present, even though we were on the other side of the building Bathtub shower squeaks
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We appreciate the opportunity you have given The Hills Hotel to provide you our services. In addition, we thank you for your feedback as these are key points for us to continue learning about what needs to be improved. Your review is invaluable to our growth.  We are glad to hear that while there were some unsatisfactory details about your stay, our customer service was to your pleasing. Taking note of your review, we have addressed the issue regarding the squeaky bathtub and bed with our engineering department, along with the hooks for towels. Hooks for towels are being placed in all of our bathrooms to better accommodate our guests. In addition, we apologize that you were unable to enjoy the HBO channel that is provided in all our rooms. It can be found on channel 3 noted on our hotel TV Guide located in the hotel directory binder. Although all of our windows are double-paned to block out traffic noise, we understand it may still be an issue for some of our valued guests whom are a bit more sensitive to such outside noise. We are sorry to hear that was the case during your stay.  We cannot stress enough our drive to accommodate our valued guests, providing the services and amenities to reach 100% satisfaction for every stay. We apologize that we were unable to meet that goal during your stay at The Hills Hotel. Again, thank you for your time! We look forward to the opportunity to provide you our services again in the future. We will love to illustrate our attention to detail in taking note of your suggestions that have been rectified and improved! Have an amazing New Year's Celebration!  Best regards,   Ronnie Torres Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I NEVER write reviews, but this hotel needs to be recognized. It is truly a hidden gem(not so hidden). I stay here every time i come to OC. The rooms are new, the rates are extremely competitive, food is excellent and the staff is incredible. I feel like I'm staying in my own apartment when I stay at The Hills. You will not find anything in the area with all they have to offer.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We can not thank you enough for taking the time to provide us your feedback from your most recent stay! It is a delight to hear your stay with us was completely satisfactory. That is what we aim for at The Hills Hotel, satisfied and happy guests!   Again, thank you for selecting The Hills Hotel and taking the time out of your day to recognize our services. We hope to continue having the pleasure of providing you accommodation. Have a beautiful Holiday Season and Happy New Year!   Best,  Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I stayed here during my weekend retreat.  What a lovely room for the end of a long day to rest up before the next busy day.  Accommodations were wonderful!  Service was top rate.  Free Wifi.  Dinner service just made it perfect.
Manager Response: Hi Dione,   We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Thank you for taking a moment out of your busy day to provide us such great feedback. We always love hearing from our guests and will be sharing this with our staff. Also, if you are traveling through the area often and require accommodations on a frequent basis, please contact one of our sales managers at sales@thelagunahillshotel.com so they may provide you a corporate rate!   Look forward to having you stay with us at The Hills Hotel in the near future. Until then, have a wonderful Holiday Season and amazing New Years!

Summary: This was a pleasant surprise. You definitely get your money's worth and the staff was very friendly. The buffet breakfast was perfect and very reasonable as well. The location is very accessible from the 5 freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We truly appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback about your visit to The Hills Hotel. We are more than happy to hear that you were pleasantly satisfied with your stay and want to thank you for giving us the opportunity to provide you all of the services and amenities  we have to offer. We will be sure to share the positive feedback. They will appreciate the recognition as well.   Happy Holidays and a Happy New Year from The Hills Hotel staff.

Summary: It had the best pilliows I have had at any hotel!! The bed was confortable. The carpet was clean. The elevator did not take forever to get to you. The staff was very friendly and efficient.  We had a very nice stay. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Candace D,  First and foremost, thank you for staying with us and taking the time to provide us your feedback and experience during your stay with us. We are glad to learn that you enjoyed the comfortable bed and pillows!  It is our goal and pleasure to make every guests stay better than the last. We hope to have you back with us soon!   Happy Holidays and a prosperous New Year from all of us at The Hills Hotel!

Summary: The Hills Hotel is conveniently located right off the 5 freeway. We stayed here the night before the Jingle Bell 5k. We booked it last minute for a great price and were very pleased with our stay. The front desk staff was very welcoming and polite. Our room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable. The only negative was we were the first room inside the door and heard it opening and slamming all night and had smoke come in our room a few times from people propping the door open and smoking outside. I would just make sure to request not to stay by the door next time, but we will definitely consider The Hills the next time we are in town.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us, Nicole! I'll be sure to pass along your message to the front desk staff. They're truly dedicated to their work, so they'll be thrilled to hear you found their service welcoming and polite. I appreciate your feedback about the smoke and noise getting in your room, and will make sure it's better insulated for future guests. It was a pleasure having you, and I look forward to your next stay with us.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: HILLS HOTEL OR HOTEL FALLING HILL??
Summary: Unfortunately when my wife and I booked this Hotel for 1 night, they had a wedding with approximately 150 people and the parking lot was loaded making it impossible to find parking once we returned.  So if you plan to stay at this hotel, you may want to ask if they are having a wedding on the night you are going.  The hotel staff should have told us in advance that there was going to be a wedding and that the hotel was going to be full.  If they are having a wedding, DO NOT STAY HERE.  They actually roped off the stairs so you could not go down to the lobby level via the carpeted stairway forcing you to use an elevator that is outdated and slow.  The bathrooms showed tremendous wear and tear.  The other thing - this hotel need a renovation - BADLY.  The elevator wood is badly
Manager Response: Hi Mike,  I'm truly sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your stay with us. The last thing I want is for any of our guests to feel inconvenienced. I'll definitely take your feedback to heart and work with the staff to make sure all our guests enjoy a comfortable stay, regardless of whether a wedding is taking place.  As for our interior, we are currently renovating all our rooms. I'll make sure the sliding window in room 308 is fixed as soon as possible.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: The Hills Hotel is conveniently located right off the 5. We stayed here over Thanksgiving weekend. We booked it last minute for a great price, and were very pleased with our stay. First off, the front desk staff were very welcoming and polite. Our room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable. The ambience has a "modern-chic" feel. Overall, the hotel was a great experience. Next time we are in town, we will definitely consider The Hills.
Manager Response: Hi Josh,  Thanks for staying with us during Thanksgiving. I'm happy to hear you were pleased with your stay and thought your room was clean and comfortable. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their welcoming and polite service as well.   Looking forward to your next stay with us!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My company uses this hotel regularly for our out of town clients and also meeting space for corporate functions.  Use to be a Holiday Inn and is an older building but now has a modern, fresh feel and we really don't have anything like it here is South Orange County.   The meeting rooms range from upscale boardroom to a grand ball room upstairs.  You could have a simple company meeting, wedding reception, anniversary party, or a sweet 16 - something for every budget.
