I recently stayed the night myself for the first time because of plumbing issues at home and it was a great little get-a-way!   The food and wine in the bar and restaurant was excellent. Home made fresh salsa with the pulled pork tacos and my breakfast of eggs benedict was yummy!  Everything about the room has been
Manager Response: Thank you for keeping us in mind whenever out of town clients are visiting Laguna Hills. It's really nice to know you appreciate our hotel's fresh and modern atmosphere. As you mentioned, we've recently remodeled our entire interior.   Thanks also for your kind words about me personally. The credit for our customer service really belongs to the entire team. I'm lucky to work with such a hardworking and dedicated group of people. It's been a pleasure hosting you and your clients, and I look forward to hearing from you again soon.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel two nights a week for a few months now.  I feel it is way above the usual business accommodations available in this area for the same price.  I have found the staff to be very courteous and responsive to my needs.  The hotel is very accessible, parking is convenient, the lobby is pleasant and the rooms clean and comfortable. The food in the restaurant is very good ( try the salmon dinner)  and the wait staff excellent.   I would highly recommend the hotel to anyone needing to be in this area on business.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us over the past few months. It's really nice to know you've found our hotel comfortable and convenient and think our service is courteous and responsive. That's the goal! I sincerely appreciate all your support.  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I had the pleasure to stay at The Hills Hotel in Laguna Hills on a recent business travel. You can tell that the building itself is very old, but they do a decent job of making it look trendy by playing with the decor. In terms of other patrons at this hotel, I saw an eclectic group of people, everyone from business travelers, tourists, to retired couple ( I didn't see many kids).   What really stood out to me about this hotel was how friendly, and professional the staff were. Upon check in, we received a coupon for a free glass of wine/beer at the bar.When my colleague needed to make copies of material for work the next day, the front desk staff were more than happy to help. When I needed a cab in the morning, again, the staff was very helpful.   The room was very clean and
Manager Response: none

Summary: I Have been to this hotel three times in the last few years. It is convenient when I visit my grandparents or we would have never been back a second time let alone a third. This hotel is falling apart and instead of fixing the necessities they focus and trying (poorly) to dress it up. The pluming in two rooms in our party was broken. The windows were nearly impossible to get open and when you did they didn't have stops do the kids could easily have fallen out. One room in the party smelled seriously like urine and mold. The fixtures in the bathroom were loose and the rooms were lightly and poorly cleaned. The restaurant was overpriced and mediocre and had no kids menu.   I have worked in hotels in just about every position. Sometimes older ones take work. If Management has their
Manager Response: I'm alarmed to hear you had such a negative experience with us. We definitely don't try to cover up necessary repairs with mere cosmetic fixes. In fact, over the past year we've committed ourselves to renovating and modernizing our entire interior. As such, I'm shocked that one room in your party smelled so unpleasant. Do you mind calling me at (949) 586-5000 with the room number? I want to make sure the plumbing in that room is completely functional. Also, since you're also experienced in the hotel industry, I would appreciate any constructive suggestions to improve.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Pleasant Surprise - a wonderful hotel and a great value!
Summary: After a long day of driving and touring in the Laguna area, we happened to see the Hills Hotel and decided to see if they had rooms available. What a find! This hotel proved to be one of the nicest stays of our vacation.   Their front desk staff was very friendly and they include a coupon for a glass of wine when you check in. Their staff went out of their way to help us with restaurant recommendations too! Rooms are spacious, include robes and slippers, luxury linens and bath amenities and a wonderful chaise lounge to sit on and relax while taking in the view of a beautiful pool.  We will certainly stay here again!
Manager Response: I'm thrilled to hear you were pleasantly surprised by us! I'll be sure to let the rest of the team know you appreciated their friendly and helpful service. All of us go out of our way to make sure our guests have a wonderful experience.   Looking forward to your next stay with us!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I have been in this business for 26 years and this property goes above and beyond with everything.  The hotel is hard to find hotel, so I called and Resa he took my hand like a child and walk me thru every turn until we arrived  love this guy.   The property was clean food great I cannot say enough. We will return this The Hills.  Upon checking out I was so fortunate to meet Chrystal she is the one who booked my reservation. This GM has a great staff truly hope he know this. She also help us to get on a ferry going to Catalina yes even after we check out of this location. She is wonderful.    We will come back! Love you guys Annie Long
Manager Response: Hi Annie,  Thank you so much for your kind review. Considering you've been in the hospitality business for 26 years, I'm honored to know you had such a fantastic stay. As you mentioned, we're lucky to have such a dedicated and hardworking staff. I'll be sure to pass along your message to Resa, Chrystal and the rest of the team.  Looking forward to your next stay with us!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: This place is a trip.     Lobby is furnished 1970's style but clean and in good condition. I don't know how they pull that off  b/c that furniture has not been made in 40 years.  Front desk was very nice and helpful. The elevator is small , slow and creaky.  Hallways and rooms have been ungraded fairly recently. Some trash bags laying around the hallway. You can tell people live here because some doors are decorated and/or personalized. That is not a good look for a 3-star hotel, in my opinion.  The room is nice and clean. Bed is very comfortable. Limited TV choices. Internet is free but slow. Plenty of parking and no charge for parking.  Noise:  The freeway is very loud on that side of the hotel.  The bar had a  strange vibe. Sports was on TV but sound was off. Music playing
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. I'm glad to know you experienced friendly and helpful service and appreciated our unique decor. We designed our lobby and hotel to acknowledge our history while still providing clean and modern amenities for our guests. If you have any suggestions for us to improve going forward, please let me know.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: The Hills is the hotel I stay at every year when we have our high school reunion. It is always very clean, reasonably priced and the staff are unbelievably friendly and helpful. Although there are other hotels in the area this one is the most convenient for me and by far my favorite!
Manager Response: Hi Valerie,  As part of a small local business, I sincerely appreciate you choosing to stay with us year after year. It's been a pleasure having you. The next time you stay with us, be sure to say hello so I can thank you in person.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: We just stayed in the this hotel the past weekend after being invited to a super sweet wedding.  Our room is newly remodeled with contemporary decor and bathroom amenities are great.  We were appointed to a room viewing the pool and is full of natural light.  Hotel staff is very courteous and friendly and very helpful.  The hotel is conveniently located with Starbucks and McDonald in short walking distance. Furthermore parking is free.  Although Internet is a little slow, it's still a good place to stay for a weekend or longer. Q
Manager Response: Thank you Monique! It's nice to know you appreciated your room's bright and open layout. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their friendly and helpful service as well. The next time you're in Laguna Hills, be sure to keep us in mind!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Stayed only one night and didn't really have time to enjoy the hotel, will stay again. Place was very clean and staff very friendly. Location was freeway close. Found a lovely Italian place very close by. Kids did enjoy the pool.
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us on TripAdvisor. Knowing that you'd stay with us again is the best compliment. Hope to see you and your family back again soon!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: We were invited to a party at this hotel and decided to stay the night and it was a great experience.  The rooms were newly remolded, modern and super clean.  The staff was helpful and the restaurant in the morning for breakfast was friendly and convenient.  We would definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Thanks Kelly! I'm happy to know you appreciated our modern rooms and experienced friendly and helpful service. Knowing that you would definitely stay with us again is the best compliment.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I attended a birthday party in the ballroom and decided to stay at the hotel.  It's easily accessible right off the freeway, and in a general area of Laguna Hills, but it feels more like you're staying in a very nice boutique hotel.  The rooms were really nice and the staff was superb.   If I was in the area again, I would stay here for sure!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us! I'm happy to hear you think our hotel has a nice boutique feel to it. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their excellent service. Looking forward to your next visit!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: We stayed 1 night while our home underwent some plumbing improvements. Our 1st floor pool room view room was remodeled in a modern pattern, nice lighting and wall treatments. The beds were quite comfortable and  the bedding was high thread count. The pool area did not have a jacuzzi. We learned upon check out that they are moving the pool to the far end of the large parking lot and the move will have a jacuzzi. We did not dine there but walked through the cafe and lounge, very tastefully designed. The staff are professional and very personable. I recommended The Hills for stays while making home improvements for locals and for visiting relatives.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with me. I'm glad to know you enjoyed a comfortable stay with us while your home was undergoing improvements. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their professional and personable service.   Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I attended a wedding here, and the venue definitely exceeded my expectations.  The Hills hotel is a beautiful venue, offered a great value, and was a short drive to laguna beach.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recommending us! I'm thrilled to hear we exceeded your expectations.   All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I travel every week and have stayed in countless hotel rooms over the years. I come to OC every weekend and have made this Hotel my OC home hotel. There are many reasons why I chose this hotel but to sum it up, very nice remodeled hotel, great location and exceptional staff willing to go out of their way to accommodate you! Special thanks Cristal and Ronnie, you are both fantastic!! Ted
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, Ted. I'm so happy to hear you think of The Hills Hotel as your home away from home. It's our goal to make all our guests feel that way. I will see in a couple of weeks!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Overall, very good experience at the hotel. Was there for five nights on business. Staff, room, and food was great. Nearby eating establishments and a Starbucks across the street were a bonus. Remarkably quiet considering it was located off of I-5.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Some good things, some not so good
Summary: My room was very musty/humid, though my friend's room was not. Rooms were clean and nicely decorated. A few critters in the rooms though. Hallways are dark and some if the rooms were VERY far from the elevators. Staff was very kind in moving our room to a closer one.  Breakfast was fine, but dinners were really bad. Took forever, many mistakes, not good/fresh tasting food. All staff was very nice and accommodating. Good location. May or may not stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed one night at The Hills Hotel during a short conference in Laguna Hills.  The hotel is conveniently located off I-5 on La Paz. Despite the busy traffic, the Hotel is set back from the road, which enhances its solitude and minimizes noise.  My group stayed in rooms on the first floor, and the rooms were exceptional for the price. They were spacious, airy, with king beds, coffee makers, and large screen TVs. My bed was very comfortable, and the air conditioning fan produced just the right amount of white noise for a great night's sleep.  I was told that the hotel is upgrading all its rooms to this standard. If so, The Hills will have a lot of happy customers.  I did not use the inviting-looking pool, nor did I eat at the restaurant. During business trips, I prefer a buffet
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It's nice to know you appreciate all the work we've done to make our rooms more modern and comfortable for our guests. I hope you get a chance to stay with us again soon!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I didn't know what to expect as I don't really know the area well. I got a discounted corporate rate, so I was not certain that the quality would be there.  I was happy to find the room in very nice condition, possibly fairly newly redone. The staff was VERY accommodating which I appreciate. I only ate once at the cafe, and I found it good.  Parking was great and the area pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you Kathy! It's nice to know you were pleasantly surprised by us. I hope you keep us in mind the next time you visit Laguna Hills!  Best wishes, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: The Hills Hotel looks great online, but is not the same in person.  I guess for the rate I should have known, but the rooms are dated, I had no hot water in the sink, and the AC is musty. I ended up sleeping with the window cracked open as far as I could push it. The rooms are spacious, but the fairfield inn nearby is more modern with free breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: we spent about twenty days recently. our stay met and surpassed all our expects.clean and modern rooms with fast service.  special thanks from mr khadivi and the other  stuffs  we really spent a good time .
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. I'm delighted to hear we surpassed all your expectations. Looking forward to your next trip to Laguna Hills!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Decent stay close to where I needed to be.
Summary: I was in the area for business, an stayed at the hotel for 2 nights. It was clean, comfortable bed, large updated bathrooms. It was a tad run down, but nothing that was the end of the world. It was quiet and met my needs as a business traveler nicely.
Manager Response: Hi Melinda,  Thanks for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'm glad to know you found your room clean and comfortable. We're in the process of renovating our entire interior, so we hope you have an even more pleasant experience the next time you stay with us.  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I've stayed here several times with large groups who buy blocks of rooms. The rooms are marginal at best.  A/C units are noisy and cycle on and off every 5 minutes all night.  Bathrooms were dirty.  Toilets would not flush unless you held the handle.  Plus, every time you asked the staff for a favor, the first answer was no.  We had a group of girls who were playing in a sports tournamanent.  They had a break at 10 in the morning and wanted to get homework done.  We asked if we could use a table in the bar that was empty.  First Answer: no.  The manager finally allowed it but there was no attempt to find an alternative.  Just no.  A friend got very ill and was staying in the room.  When asked for a late check out, they offer 30 minutes.  When they went to book for an extra night
Manager Response: Dear tfpucknut,  I am terribly sorry  to learn that we failed to exceed your expectations.  I would like to make this right, please contact me at rtorres@thelagunahillshotel.com to discuss your concerns further.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Great Service from all the Staff I encountered
Summary: I recently had a one night stay at the Hills Hotel with my 4 children.  From the moment I checked in to the moment I checked out I only encountered friendly and accommodating staff.  Room service was fast and when our toilet got stopped up (remember 4 kids in the room) they came immediately and took care of it.  Room was very nice (we stayed in the upgraded area) but for me service is always the most important thing.  Nice rooms are everywhere....but across the board friendly and accommodating staff is much harder to find.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. I'm delighted to hear that you experienced friendly and accommodating service from the moment you checked in. Hope you and your family get a chance to stay with us again soon!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Nice rooms although you could tell that the room was old and they tried to make it look more modern. Rooms roomy and clean. Beds a little too soft. They didn't clean the room and didn't replenish the toiletries during our stay. The trash wasn't taken out despite the bin being overflowing. Otherwise decent room although a little overpriced for the service received.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'm happy to hear you found your room spacious and clean. I'm sorry, though, that we didn't freshen up your room during your stay. I'll be sure to discuss this with the housekeeping staff so that we can better serve our guests going forward.   Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: a nice hotel, with good location and pleasant staff
Summary: This is my 6th or 7th time I am staying at The Hills Hotel. They always provide good service, and since they have added amenities to the rooms and renovated them, your stay is even more pleasurable. Staff are courteous and helpful. Accessibility is a great plus.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recommending us!  I sincerely appreciate all your support. The next time you stay with us, be sure to say hello so I can thank you in person.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: One Night Stay at Hills Hotel
Summary: Stayed at the Hills Hotel last week during a west coast business trip. Overall I had a decent experience.  The hotel is easy to find at the La Paz exit on Interstate 5 in the Laguna Hills area of southern California.  The check in process went smooth and the room I was given was very clean and spacious.  The room had a good sized flat screen TV, updated bathroom, in room refrigerator, large bed, safe, and other extras.  The outside pool was large, had plenty of chairs and was clean.  My only meal  I had at the hotel was breakfast. The food was very good, service prompt and reasonably priced.  While I did not utilize the bar area it appeared to be large and well attended.  Generally my only complaint is that I like to exercise when on the road and the Fitness Center only had a
Manager Response: Hi Dave,  Thanks for staying with last week. I'm glad to know you found your room clean, spacious and comfortable. I hope you keep us in mind the next time you're traveling through Laguna Hills!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I was very disappointed with my stay at this hotel. The front desk staff were not friendly, they seemed like they didn't want to be there. Since I booked with Expedia I guess I get the worse room in the house. I had a basement room looking out back to dumpsters, two large trailers and misc. junk.  I'm glad it was only a one night stay, I was glad to get out of there early the next morning.
Manager Response: Owen,  I'm sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your stay with us. The last thing I want is for our staff to come across that way. I'll be sure to speak with them to make sure their service is more welcoming going forward.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Not a Safe Hotel, watch your stuff!!!!!
Summary: I had a really bad experience in this hotel. I attend a wedding in The Hills Hotel last month. When we entered the hotel parking area all the parking spaces were full so I asked the hotel personnel where to park and they said that the hotel is offering free Valet parking tonight for the wedding. I usually don’t give my car to valet but this time I thought it might me fine since it looks like a safe hotel. Anyway, when I got my car back there were some stuff missing from my car. It took me a few minutes to find out what’s missing and by that time the valet guys were gone. I complained to the hotel receptionists. They said they don’t know who those valet guys are and they had never seen them before. They had no record of the valet company; they refused to call the manager. I
Manager Response: I know we already wrote to each other on Yelp, but I wanted to reach out to you on TripAdvisor as well. We carefully vet which third-party vendors we use, so we're surprised about your experience. We want to do what we can to help you get in contact with the valet company. When you get a chance, please call us at (949) 586-5000.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: For Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach, stay here!
Summary: Great room, nice decor, pleasant and helpful staff... but the ceiling in the bath was all rusty and leaking around the access panel. Water dripped when someone one floor above took a shower! Yikes! Great remodel, but hire a new plumber...otherwise a great, attractive, easily accessible hotel!
Manager Response: Geoffrey, Thanks for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I appreciate your feedback about your bathroom ceiling, and will make sure it's fixed right away. Do you mind letting me know which room you stayed in? When you get a chance, please call me at (949) 586-5000.  Thanks, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: The staff was very helpful at the front desk and in the cafe. The room and amenities were great. My husband and I enjoyed the view of the freeway. One of the best Choice hotels we've stayed at. We definitely would return!! We hope to come back this winter.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us! It was a pleasure hosting you and your husband, and I look forward to seeing you again this winter.  - Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: This is a pig with lipstick.  The designer has good taste but this is an old hotel with fresh paint.  If you're room is pool-side expect a lot of noise until 10pm.  There is no jacuzzi at the pool and there wasn't a bath tub in the room (i.e. no way to soak sore muscles).  The menu is extremely limited and there isn't a kids menu. The bed was comfortable.  The shower was awkward (the controls are not optimally placed).  The staff were all courteous, professional and helpful.  Thankfully, we were only there for 1 night. We won't be back.
Manager Response: Eri,  I'm shocked and disheartened to hear you think of our hotel that way. We've put in a lot of work to renovate our hotel in order to offer our guests a better experience. I'll be sure to keep your feedback in mind going forward. I'm relieved to know that at least you found our staff courteous, professional and helpful. We sincerely want our guests to enjoy their stay with us.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My husband and I had a wonderful getaway at the Hills. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. We had fun with the bartender from Austria, and enjoyed the live music. The room was clean and nicely appointed. Our only complaint was that the simple continental breakfast and coffee offered should be complimentary as with most 3-star hotels.
Manager Response: Karen,  Thank you for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'm delighted to hear you and your husband had a wonderful stay with us. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their friendly service as well. Hope you get a chance to visit Laguna Hills again soon!  Take care, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I stayed just one night and had a positive experience.  The room was a good size, bathroom in good condition (although the shower was a bit low on pressure), free wi-fi, reasonably priced breakfast, helpful staff.  The room's air con unit was a little noisy but generally the place was very quiet.  If you're happy with three star accommodation, then The Hills is a pretty good, especially at the price I paid.
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us! I'm glad to know you found your room both comfortable and affordable. I hope you keep us in mind the next time you visit Laguna Hills!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Got there late, so didn't check out any amenities.  The room was good sized, but there was an abundance of mold in the bathtub which was pretty disconcerting.  Convenient location came with loud traffic but it was drowned out by the air conditioner.  The elevators were dilapidated and plain scary.  This place is decades over due for a real update and is way overpriced. But then again this IS Orange County.  Mea culpa, we were so tired, we didn't complain.
Manager Response: Melinda,  I'm shocked to hear there was an abundance of mold in your tub. We normally put much more thought and care into the upkeep of our rooms. Do you mind letting me know what room you stayed in? I want to make sure we fix the problem right away. When you get a chance, please call me at (949) 586-5000.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Iove the hotel... Only thing I would change is the temperature f the room when u first get there...talk about sauna ... Other than that great hotel great staff . Beautiful ball rooms area. Atm available. Inexpensive breakfast available. Drinks at night time.
Manager Response: Hi Ashley,  Thanks for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their service, and I look forward to your next stay with us.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: For the price, I was expecting a complimentary breakfast, but we did not receive that.  I was pretty disappointed. The rooms weren't bad.  They were clean but you could definitely tell we were in an older room. Would maybe stay there again if in the area but we did not feel this was one of the "better" hotels in the Ascend collection.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear you were disappointed by us. We've worked hard to offer our guests a clean and comfortable space, renovating the entire interior of our hotel. Besides a complimentary breakfast, what can we do to better serve our guests? I sincerely appreciate your feedback and hope to hear back from you soon.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Location was great, beds were good and clean rooms were kept up nice except for the fact our shower bottom was warped and uneven and needed to be replaced.  Hallways were dark and gloomy needed a good paint job and lighting.  Overall was a good stay... quiet in our room.
Manager Response: Brandon,  Thank you for letting me know about your experience. I'm glad to know you appreciated our convenient location and our clean and comfortable rooms. I appreciate your detailed feedback about our showers and hallways, and will definitely keep it in mind the next time we renovate our interior.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: This is a good place to stay. The lobby looks really good as you enter the hotel. The lounge looked nice and the restaurant is also good. The staff seemed very friendly and eager to help. The rooms are very well laid out with enough space to move around without bumping into things. The bathroom was very well done with a dual-flush toilet and nice fittings. The only thing that I noticed were the walls in the corridor that seemed a little bare for a hotel of this stature. Perhaps an upgrade to that and the carpeting would make the plan shine even better. Didn't go to the pool but it looked good with people enjoying it. I wish my trip was longer.
Manager Response: Hi Jay,  Thank you for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'm glad to know you had a great experience from the moment you walked through our doors. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their friendly and helpful service as well.  Please know that we are currently in the process of upgrading our entire interior, including our walls and carpeting. We hope to have everything completed soon.   Looking forward to your next trip to Laguna Hills!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Loud, loud and loud.  Big sporting event stayed here; there was a huge group of young girls having a fun but extremely loud pool time until 10pm each nite.  We were awake each the until they finally left. Staff was ambivalent when we complained. Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear you had an unpleasant stay with us. We try to accommodate all our guests, whether they want to enjoy our pool or want to relax in their room. Having said that, we should've been more helpful when you brought your complaint to our attention. I'll be sure to discuss your experience with the staff so that we can better serve our guests going forward.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Well, Me and my three girlfriends decided to get a hotel to celebrate our high school graduation. I was so excited to stay because the price wasn't half bad for a decent room. Our experience however was ruined by a certain clerk that I didn't catch the name of but I plan on retrieving it soon so I can complain to corporate. (Yes, it was that bad.) Anyway, I went to check into my room at about 11:45pm and as soon as he saw the age on my licence he became a sarcastic bitter old man. Because me and my friends were 18 he started questioning us on how we attained a reservation and how it makes him really uncomfortable that he has to now "babysit" us all night. According to him he was baffled that the hotel even allowed 18 yr olds to stay at the hotel. When we got to the room we got a
Manager Response: Andrea,  Thank you for letting me know what happened. I'm truly shocked by your experience, and I sincerely apologize. The behavior you described is definitely not representative of us as a whole. Whether our guests are 18 or 80, we want everyone to feel welcome and comfortable here. I will address your experience with the staff member in question right away. Hopefully, we'll be able to better serve our guests going forward.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: When I arrived parking was available and my room was ready. The hotel was very clean and quiet. The location allowed for easy access to freeways and services. Compared to the other facilities in this area the Hills offered a great value. The final deciding factor was that this was a pet friendly location.
Manager Response: Hi James,  Thank you so much for your review. It's our goal to offer clean and comfortable rooms at an affordable price. Accordingly, I'm thrilled to know you think we offer a great value compared to other hotels in the area. It was a pleasure hosting you, and I hope you're able to stay with us again soon.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: We had our wonderful wedding at The Hills
Summary: I had my wedding at The Hills hotel in June 2013, it was a great experience! The facilities were wonderful and the staff was very professional.  The banquet room was beautiful and the lighting was amazing. Our wedding guests all told us they were blown away. We loved the cocktail / reception area because it has a great flow between the bar, banquet room and an out-door patio this allowed our guests to come and go as the please and take photos in our photo booth! We also loved how our open bar is not just some temporary table with a bartender standing there, it was really a bar!  Our coordinator, Robin, was very helpful and very professional. She was able to work out even our strangest requests into the wedding.  I would recommend anyone looking to get married in LA or OC county
Manager Response: Hi Ed,  Congrats on getting married! I'm so glad you decided to have the wedding with us, and I'm happy to know it was a wonderful experience. I'll be sure to let Robin know you appreciated her helpful and professional service.   Thank you so much for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I hope you get a chance to visit Laguna Hills again soon!  Best wishes, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My wife and I attend the wedding and stayed one night, the ballroom is beautiful and food is delicious … the staff are professional and provide an excellent services. The room is very comfy . highly recommend for weekend getaway and for wedding banquet!  Rich
Manager Response: Hi Rich,  Thanks for staying with us! I'm delighted to know you and your wife had a wonderful time. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their excellent service. It was a pleasure hosting you, and I hope you get a chance to stay with us again soon.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Had breakfast here after staying overnight. The restaurant decor is pretty and the food is tasty and it's a great place to wake up or relax after a long night out.  I didn't get to use the pool, but it looked pretty fun as well.  ~Andrew
Manager Response: Hi Andrew,  Thanks for recommending us on TripAdvisor. I'm happy to hear you think of us as a great place to relax after a night out. From our comfortable rooms to our hospitable service, we want all our guests to have a great stay with us. Hope to see you again the next time you're in Laguna Hills!  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Service was far beyond expectations. The staff here are all very courteous, welcoming and caring. At breakfast the staff became like friends to us and the manager made a stop by all the tables to greet the guests. The breakfast and especially the pastries were delicious. We had a dinner tiramisu that everyone should try. We stayed for a wedding hosted at this hotel. The ceremony and reception were beautiful. Food was good, but I can't say enough about the desserts and pastries! Whoever this 'Chef Ed' is, he has it down. As a venue it was perfect and felt intimate yet had several areas for big and small groups of people to mingle. It felt like home and this hotel is a gem in Laguna Hills.
Manager Response: Hi Calvin,  I know we already wrote to each other on Yelp, but I wanted to thank you for recommending us on TripAdvisor as well. Hope you get a chance to visit Laguna Hills again soon!  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: My room at the Hills Hotel was clean, spacious, and had a very large window that provided ample light while keeping the room private (the windows are mirrored so you can't really see into them from the outside). The bathroom exhaust fan wasn't working, so that was a bit of a problem.  I felt the room was a bit dated, but the amenities were as stated in the room listing. Apparently the hotel is renovating the rooms, but I didn't stay in one of the newer ones. From what I heard from a friend who also stayed at the hotel, they're nicer and more stylish. One HUGE plus: the air conditioner is not very loud. (My previous night's stay at a different hotel made me feel like I was sleeping next to a generator.) I used it throughout the night and didn't get woken up at all.  Staff are
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us to your friends. I'll be sure to let the staff know you appreciated their friendly and helpful service. As for our renovations, we hope to be finished soon, and we expect them to adequately take care of the issues you mentioned. I hope you stay with us again once all our renovations are completed.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights over this Memorial day weekend. Reservation had been made by our relatives in Mission Viejo as we were visiting to attend a family function. Hotel room was nice, I am not sure what price was paid by my relatives; but they were told that it has a microwave, and it didn't.  Also, we were given an 'accessible' room, without checking our preference and its inconvenient for me as there is NO counter-space in an accessible bathroom for my cosmetics/flat-iron, etc. And I have a 2 yr old toddler who would definitely want to touch that HOT flat-iron if it is on the floor! :)  There wasn't a conditioner bottle in the bathroom when we first checked in on Friday and one wasn't added even when the room was cleaned the next day. The annoying part is that when I asked
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such detailed feedback. Although we wish that we had been able to show you a five-star experience, we are confident that your review will allow us to become even better for our guests. It all begins with proper communication, so we'll be sure to share your comments with our team. Thanks for your honesty. We hope to have another chance to wow you next time you're in Laguna Hills.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Better When It Was A Holiday Inn
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times over the years, mostly back when it was a Holiday Inn. This is the first time since it became a Choice Hotel. In my opinion it was a better hotel when it was flagged by Holiday Inn. Even though they have made an attempt to renovate the common areas the hotel is still tired. The hallways were painted this awful grey and carpeted with this dark indistinct pattern that makes the place look like a prison. And what's with all the annoying flashing twinkle lights out front? Tacky! The interior designer must have been the owner's wife.  The bar would be a major disappointment if it were ever open. As near as I could tell the bar is only open from 5 to 10 on weekdays, and that's if they don't have a private party going on. Who ever decorated the
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this hotel!! Very clean rooms, great decor and very comfortable beds. Breakfast Buffet was delicious!! Beautiful pool. Great location 15 minutes to Laguna Beach and half way between LA and San Diego. Will definitely stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We've stayed here a few times now (once was for my sisters wedding, once for a friends weekend, and a few couples weekend getaways) and have always loved this little gem!  The staff has always been very friendly and helpful, very nice and clean rooms, heavenly beds, great little restaurant and bar, convenient location, affordable rates...just perfect!!  We always book thru ChoiceHotels and get great weekend rates.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. I'm thrilled to know you've consistently experienced helpful service and clean and comfortable rooms. It's our goal to offer our guests a wonderful stay at an affordable price. Looking forward to your next trip to Laguna Hills!  Best wishes, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: ute little hotel but definitely not near the almost-luxury experience that ChoiceHotels is trying to sell - I have staye
Summary: I have been SPG Platinum and HHonors Diamond since 2004 and since recently ChoiceHotels Diamond as well. By any of those standards, my stay at The Hills Hotels was sub-standard by the three most objective criteria I could think of  - Front-desk interaction - confusion of who does what from the very beginning, received a coupon for 1-beer or wine which was difficult to redeem since the Bar was closed off for a private function, and the staff at the restaurant after a 5-7 minute wait send me back to the Bar, which was closed - overall unpleasant experience  - Internet availability - Wi-fi only worked in the lobby, no wi-fi connectivity in the room to speak of, however the cable worked in the room - overall unsatisfactory  - Gym - old, tired, not very clean gym with 2 machines, no
Manager Response: Teodor,  Thank you for taking the time to review us. I'm sorry we didn't live up to your high expectations, and I appreciate you evaluating us based on objective criteria. With respect to our gym and internet, we are currently in the process of updating our equiptment. I hope this adequately addresses your concerns.  With respect to our service, I apologize for the confusion regarding your coupon. I'll be sure to speak with the staff about your experience so that we can better serve our guests going forward.  Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Love This Hotel 3 miles from Home (Roundtrip)
Summary: Our house was under construction getting a remodel..during the last week was sanding and staining and then varnishing hardwood floors..we stayed 6 days at THE HILLS..had No Idea How Nice it was..From the minute I made reservations with AMAN ..who was very accommodating ..To the EXCELLENT MAID SERVICE..the sheets and the Bed are like STARWOOD HOTELS..HEAVENLY BEDS.. Never had a Hotel with such great Service..Best Part ..we were able to keep our 10 yr. old..Papillon with us ..Didn't have to Kennel Her..inly thing that would have put the Cherry on this trip would've been doggie treats and or doggie bowls.. What a treat for us..Highly Recommend this Hotel ..Staff is .. Very friendly..
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I booked our stay at the Hills Hotel with a group rate of $115 per night.  We were assigned a room which overlooked the freeway, and it was very noisy even with the windows closed.  Both of us are easily awakened, so my husband got on the phone and requested a different room across the building.  We moved to a room overlooking the pool.  It was much quieter, but then some people were loud at the pool late at night.  We couldn't win.  Unfortunately we were charged a $10 fee for changing rooms.    The event we attended in the ball room was awesome.  The hallways and loft surrounding our event which held the silent auctions was perfect.  The food served at our banquet was delicious.  Our breakfast at the restaurant was delicious as well, and we received excellent
Manager Response: none

Summary: The facility is good but not top of the line, some of the areas in the bathrooms and rooms are showing age. Also, fitness center needs some serious attention - not really up to standards found in most 2 star hotels I travel in for business - expected much more. Staff was quite courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We genuinely appreciate and listen to customer feedback, and use it to improve going forward. In fact, we are currently in the process of renovating our entire interior, including our gym. We hope to be able to offer our guests modern rooms and new amenities by the end of the year. I hope you give us another chance and stay with us the next time you're in town.  All the best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Booked a colleague here as its near my home and I was impressed with the changes that have been made since it was the Old Holiday Inn. Its very contemporary on the inside and the renovated rooms are very attractive and comfortable. The restaurant was very good for breakfast although a bit pricey. Will definitely use this property again when needed. The banquet room also looked nice and the bar is contemporary as well
Manager Response: Steve,  Thank you for recommending us on TripAdvisor. Knowing that you plan to book a room with us again is the best compliment. It's nice to know you recognize and appreciate all the changes we've made recently to renovate and modernize our rooms.   Best, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Specfically told the rep i booked my room over the phone that i want the new rooms and willing to pay more for it. Anyways this was not room was not NEW .  RIPOFF! and pissed  stay away from room #125 and i am pissed that rep that i

I apologize if our service didn't exceed your expectations. I have sent you a private message to get a better understanding regarding your recent experience with us.  Both our Chief Engineer and Housekeeping manager is doing a thorough inspection in the room to avoid this type of inconvenience in the future.  Again, I apologize for failing to exceed your expectations and I hope you will still give us another chance to provide you an exceptional service.  You can always reach me via email at rtorres@thelagunahillshotel.com or my direct line at 949 268 9300.

Summary: I recently stayed for a 5 night, long overdue, southern California visit with friends and family. I chose The Hills for the location and price. I honestly didn't expect to have such a perfect stay. I deliberately got the remodeled room which was amazing. I was very worried as it looked out on the freeway, uh oh noise, well suffice it to say I couldn't even hear trucks in the middle of the night, nor could I hear doors opening and closing, toilets flushing, people walking above me or outside the room. The bed was very comfortable, internet was good, no passwords to keep booting you off in the middle of something. I regret I was too busy to eat there. The breakfast buffet looked amazing.  There was a wedding one night, could hear slightly from lobby, no where else. The bar looked
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have reviewed this hotel in the past and do so again because the experience just gets better each time! I was fortunate to have one of the recently refurbished room and it reflected the thought and style and probably the direction the entire hotel is taking. Refrigerator, microwave, comfortable bed and clean. The friendly front desk and attention to detail coupled with the a great breakfast makes a stay easy and allows shopping, sightseeing or beach time. The nearby restaurants also enhance the stay at the Hills. Ask for Arman Khadiwi, Front Desk Supervisor at The Hills Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. I'm delighted to know every stay with us has been better than the last. That's exactly the direction where we want to be heading! We'd love to hear about your experience on Yelp as well. Thanks again for all your support. I sincerely look forward to your next stay with us.    Best wishes, Ronnie Torres, Rooms Division Manager

Summary: On a recent working vacation to California, I was fortunate enough to stay at the Hills Hotel. I am a firm believer that it's easy to put in a marble floor in the lobby, the hard part is good service. The Hills Hotel has outstanding service. I'm bad at names, but there was a male Front Desk Attendant, who greeted me by name from the first day until the last. That recognition made me feel like I was the most important guest in the hotel. The Front Desk was also very attentive while I received fax after fax. Service and the food at the restaurant was just as impressive. The property, inside and out, always looked fantastic. Like every room I stay in, I thoroughly inspected my room when I checked in and found it to be perfectly clean. The decor in the room was very nice, the bed
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice hotel that was pet friendly.  As a small pet owner it is hard to believe these big chain hotels who advertise "pet friendly" and then want $100 or more for the pet to stay is false advertising.  This hotel only charged $30, which is reasonable. We are very clean with our pet and travel with her own bed.  On other notes, this is a very clean and friendly hotel. The staff were very helpful and kind. It has a great Italian restaurant right around the corner and is close to I-5.  Would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Recently attended a meeting at this hotel. Had an excellent experience. Hotel is going a refurbishment and they have done a great job of the new rooms. Meeting facilities were really nice. Staff was professional and friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: So much potential to be great
Summary: Let me start by saying the staff at the front desk are exceptional. They were friendly and very willing to help with anything you need.  The outside of the property is very nice and the lobby/bar area is great as well. The thing that surprised me the most was that the rooms were lacking the attention to detail that you should expect from a boutique hotel such as this.  The vanities in the bathrooms, ( I had 2 rooms), were in poor condition. Chips of the wood broken off showing raw wood and the paint was in bad condition.  The doors to both bathrooms had marks on them and one of them needed to be replaced or at the bare minimum needed a new paint job. One of the exhaust registers was at least an inch away from the wall and there was no exhaust fan working for that bathroom. Also
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have recently stayed at this hotel for 4 days. It is a very clean and simple hotel. Our room was facing the outdoor pool at the back and was very quiet. Parking and wireless internet were free. I would recommend this Hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this excellent hotel number of nights and everything was absolutly awsome, I can't say enough about how great the customer service was and how amasing the personnel were. I came back to this hotel a number of times in a period of 5 weeks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: the customer service is amazing I showed up and Resa khadiwi was more then accommodating. he was very polite and went out of his way to make sure my stay was comfortable. he is the what customer service should should be at every hospitality hotel. amazing customer service!!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great staff, great price
Summary: I stayed at the hotel during a business meeting. I love the modern contemporary decor in the lobby and the guest rooms. The bed was very comfy, enough pillows, soft and firm combined, a robe and slippers in the spacious bathroom and free WIFI were tempting me to miss my meeting and stay in my room just to enjoy it's comforts. The meeting rooms are newly renovated as well.The food provided during breaks was delicious, the pastry chef's creations too tasty to ignore. But the best feature if you can call it that is the staff. Everyone was very friendly, efficient and hospitable. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my co-workers,friends and family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Used the Hills Hotel for a family reunion and the staff were extremely friendly, the rooms are sufficiently equipped and they provide free WIFI. The hotel is in a great location, near the freeway and opposite Starbucks and a few other stores. We used the function room facilities, the bar and the restaurant and the staff were absolutely first class in terms of service and I will certainly return to this hotel upon my next visit to Laguna Hills.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice, very clean hotel. I am not giving 5 stars only for one reason - hotel does not have rooms with 2 queen beds. I was traveling with kids and two double beds did not work well... This hotel is a member of Choice Hotel group. So, register there (it is free), and as a member you would be greeted with a glass of vine. I think this is nice. We also tried a breakfast buffet in the hotel. It is not a "free continental breakfast"; we paid $10.50 per person... But, food was good and service quick.

Our room had two double beds with sandpaper for sheets. One of the beds was cozied up to the air conditioner which blew on me all night long.   The shower failed to get hot until I was almost done. Some of our friends saw mold and other cleanliness issues in their bathrooms but ours was clean.   All in all, I was left with feeling like the property was under appreciated. It probably could be a cool hotel but it does need some renovations.   We

Summary Heading: Weekend Romantic Getaway to Laguna Beach Cities!
Summary: My husband and I spent two nights over President's Day Weekend at The Hills.  Our king-bed room was very spacious.  Nice bed linens and we both slept very comfortably!  Free bottles of water in our room were a nice touch!  My husband is tall, so the high showerhead, great water pressure and deep tub were all a plus for us!  There were some touch-ups with paint on the door and in the bathroom in mid-progress, but it didn't affect our visit in the least.  Our room was on the I-5 side of the hotel, but you wouldn't have known it with no traffic noise at all!  All of the facilities were beautifully appointed, nice lounge and restaurant, as well as a comfortable front patio seating area.  Perfect location to head out to any of the Beach Cities. Summary: The Hills Hotel was a surprise and excellent value. We found it easy to park with the abundant parking and easy to find just off of the Interstate 5 freeway. As you enter through the front doors you notice a restaurant on one side and in front of you a newly remodeled lounge and entertainment on the weekends. The front desk on the left was better than I expected. The manager introduced himself and all of the Hotel personnel were dressed professionally. I was surprised to find a sincere concern on my comfort and a sincere willingness to help. We needed a refrigerator for medicine and a refrigerator was delivered and working in 5 minutes. Room service was wonderful, timely, and the food quality was excellent. My stay was in one word~ enjoyable.  The room was clean and quite large.

Again, Thank you so much for the great feedback and we are looking forward to your next visit!!
